summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AudioMedic medical transcription system. Backend authentication and basic CRUD operations working correctly. Frontend UI navigation and user flows functioning properly. Critical issue: OpenAI API key invalid, blocking audio transcription and clinical structuring features.

critical_bugs.issue: OpenAI API key invalid - Error 401: 'Incorrect API key provided: sk-emerg******************4A1C'

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix OpenAI API key configuration. Current EMERGENT_LLM_KEY (sk-emerg******************4A1C) is invalid for OpenAI API. This blocks core functionality: audio transcription via Whisper API and clinical note structuring via GPT-5. Also fix email validation issue in frontend auth form.
